channel.title: CTF Challanges, Tools, and everything I created. on Nasef | Security Consultant and Instructor
channel.description: Recent content in CTF Challanges, Tools, and everything I created. on Nasef | Security Consultant and Instructor

item.title: Ansible Privilege Escalation
item.description: Shell.yml is an ansible playbook you can use to make linux privilege escalation attack from User A to User B. User A must have sudo permessions to run ansible-playbook as User B

item.title: LinEsc Vulnerable Machine
item.description: LinEsc is a machine built to demonstrate the 7 most common ways of Linux privilege escalation. Description Target: get root privileges with 7+ different ways.

item.title: NASEF: Locating Target (#1) Vulnerable Machine
item.description: Commander-in-chief : Hello Agent R, Two hours ago we lost contact with agent (N.A.S.E.F). He was in a secret mission in the enemy state “SOURG”. Your mission is to lead the task-force and bring him to our homeland safely, But first we need to hack into SOURG’s satellites to locate both user and root flag which represents nasef’s coordinates.
